Detailed Description

Definitions for SPU-initiated DMA transfer for 2D region.

) [inline, static]

DMA get operation for 2D region

Parameters:
[in] ls_addr - destination LS addr
[in] ea_base - EA base addr
[in] region_size_x - the width (X size) of the region
[in] transfer_start_x - X left-top corner point of the region to be transfered
[in] transfer_start_y - Y left-top corner point of the region to be transfered
[in] tansfer_size_x - size in X to be transfered
[in] tansfer_size_y - size in Y to be transfered
[in] tag - DMA tag to be associated to the initiating transfer
Returns:
void

DMA transfer for 2D region

Parameters:
[in] ls_addr - LS addr
[in] ea_base - EA base addr
[in] region_size_x - the width (X size) of the region
[in] transfer_start_x - X left-top corner point of the region to be transfered
[in] transfer_start_y - Y left-top corner point of the region to be transfered
[in] tansfer_size_x - size in X to be transfered
[in] tansfer_size_y - size in Y to be transfered
[in] tag - DMA tag to be associated to the initiating transfer
[in] cmd - DMA command to issue
